root.name: Laser Blast
root.description: Difficulty SettingsLaser Blast features 4 different difficulty settings: Game 1: Cadet LevelGame 2: Lieutenant LevelGame 3: Captain LevelGame 4: Commander Level Difficulty LevelWave 1Wave 2Wave 3 Cadet 1 2 4 Lieutenant 1 2 4 Captain 1 2 4 Commander 1 32 32 Difficulty Level Wave 4 Wave 5 Wave 6 Cadet 8 88 Lieutenant 8 16 16 Captain 8 16 32 Commander 32 32 32
